scenarios.name: f5A/2A starter
scenarios.description:
2A 3A 66B |
Basic combo conversion for far melee pokes.
3A only combo into 66B on ground

scenarios.name: 66B starter
scenarios.description:
66B SC205 |
Best (only) way to follow-up 66B.
Also works with Luminous Ricochet.

scenarios.name: j6A Air-to-Air
scenarios.description:
j.6A j.6C j.66 j.6C |
Basic Air-to-Air combo conversion.
Pray it limits,
otherwise you may add d.236B.

scenarios.name: 3A Anti-air
scenarios.description:
3A hj.9 j.5A j.6A j.6C |
You can combo from 3A,
if you hit it high enough.
The opposing character can not air tech
after 3A.

scenarios.name: 66C CH
scenarios.description:
66C hj.9/D9 j.5A j.2A 66A d.623B|
The best meterless combo off of 66C.
You have to walk back a little sometimes.
After j.5A it is corner only.
It is the corner ender theory.

scenarios.name: 5AAA starter
scenarios.description:
5AAA 2B hjc.9 j.2B j.66/D6/D3 j.5A 5AAAA |
Common Midscreen BnB.
Doesn't work on midgets
and most crouching characters.
